comment: Smart Data Models - ExcDC3A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcDC3A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. This is modified IEEE DC3A direct current commutator exciters with speed input, and death band.  DC old type 4.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: edfmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage exciter output limiter (Efdmax).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efd1
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (Efd1).  Typical Value = 2.6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efd2
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (Efd2).  Typical Value = 3.45. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efdlim
contents.comment: (Efdlim). true = exciter output limiter is active false = exciter output limiter not active. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: efdmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage exciter output limiter (Efdmin).  Typical Value = -99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: exclim
contents.comment: (exclim).  IEEE standard is ambiguous about lower limit on exciter output. true = a lower limit of zero is applied to integrator output false = a lower limit of zero not applied to integrator output. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kr
contents.comment: Death band (Kr).  If Kr is not zero, the voltage regulator input changes at a constant rate if Verr > Kr or Verr < -Kr as per the IEEE (1968) Type 4 model. If Kr is zero, the error signal drives the voltage regulator continuously as per the IEEE (1980) DC3 and IEEE (1992, 2005) DC3A models.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks
contents.comment: Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kv
contents.comment: Fast raise/lower contact setting (Kv).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seefd1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Efd1 (Se[Eefd1]).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seefd2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Efd2 (Se[Efd2]).  Typical Value = 0.35. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 1.83. Default: 0

contents.name: trh
contents.comment: Rheostat travel time (Trh).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
